meanings.definition: A mark left on the skin or within body tissue where a wound, burn, or sore has not healed completely and fibrous connective tissue has developed.
meanings.sent1: The scar on his arm reminded him of the accident.
meanings.sent2: She had a scar on her knee from falling off her bike.
meanings.sent3: The scar on his face made him look like a brave warrior.
meanings.sent4: Her emotional scars were as deep as the physical ones.
meanings.sent5: The scar on the tree trunk told a story of survival.

meanings.definition: A lasting effect of grief, fear, or other emotion left on a person's character by a traumatic experience.
meanings.sent1: The loss of her pet left a scar on her heart.
meanings.sent2: His childhood scar of abandonment affected his relationships.
meanings.sent3: Despite the scar of failure, he continued to pursue his dreams.
meanings.sent4: The scar of betrayal changed her perspective on trust.
meanings.sent5: The scar of war haunted his dreams every night.
